page.title: 15Hereward Radio
page.content: { Hereward Radio}(Peterborough) is one of 47 independent local radio stations broadcasting throughout the U.K. funded by advertisig revenue and co-sponsorship. Broadcasting 20 hours a day to a potential audience of 770,000 in Peterborough and the fens, Hereward Radio strives to provide an accurate, up-to-the-minute news service along with a popular blend of music, plus interesting features and competitions. Nearly every weekend of the year the station's outside broadcast unit can be found at various events throughout the region, one of the most popular being the Hereward Radio National Dyke Jumping Champion- ships which attracts numerous entrants and considerable local and national media coverage. The station organises visits for disabled people, financed by an annual Christmas radio auction.
